page.title: 12Recreation, Ceres/Pitscottie
page.content: Sport is the most popular pastime with younger people but the older generation like gardening, watching television, do-it-yourself and needlework. There are clubs to suit all ages. Because most gardens in the area are large, many people spend up to four hours gardening each week during the summer months. Birdwatching, horse riding, cycling and exploring other areas by car are other interests. More than 50% of the residents said that they enjoyed walking in the area. Fishing for brown trout in Ceres Burn is popular with local and visiting anglers. There is a newly resurfaced tennis court and a disused curling pond. Ceres Half Marathon attracts hundreds of visiting runners each August.
